text.tspan: What SIs can deliver with F1r3fly: differentiated performance-per-watt,
caps-based security, BFT resilience, and next-gen AI orchestration.

g.text: Rholang mapped to dataflow architectures -> throughput-per-watt gains
Capability-based security model -> least privilege and composable access
Distributed systems that tolerate arbitrary failures in adversarial environments
Targeting 10x-1000x throughput-per-watt for next-gen AI infrastructure
Lower power, smaller footprint, and better unit economics.
Differentiated offerings for high-throughput distributed systems
Reduced operational risk with correctness tooling (OSLF) and caps security
BFT resilience as a default posture for decentralized deployments
Modern AI infra orchestration with a message-first, network-native model
Decentralized systems: blockchains, DAGs, and custom topologies
AI pipeline orchestration with throughput-per-watt targets
Note: F1r3fly is a platform for BFT and distributed systems, not a blockchain product.
Positioning: deliver more capacity per watt, with stronger security and resilience.
